code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const Categories=props=>{const[categories]=useState([{key:'all',name:'Всё'},{key:'motorbike',name:'Мотоциклы'},{key:'moped',name:'Мопеды'},{key:'scooter',name:'Скутеры'},{key:'ATV',name:'Квадроциклы'}]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"categories",children:categories.map(el=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:()=>props.chooseCategory(el.key),children:el.name},el.key))});};export default Categories;
